lead_paragraph: Former South Africa international Gulam Bodi has been banned from all cricket-related activities for 20 years after admitting he attempted to fix matches in the country’s domestic Twenty20 competition this season.

headline.print_headline: South Africa Bans Bodi for 20 Years for Match-Fixing
headline.main: South Africa Bans Bodi for 20 Years for Match-Fixing

snippet: Former South Africa international Gulam Bodi has been banned from all cricket-related activities for 20 years after admitting he attempted to fix matches in the country’s domestic Twenty20 competition this season....
